data.comment: The match is underway in Grozny.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 2, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Volgograd's half.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny attack through Aleksandr Putsko. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 14, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Volgograd's area.
Akhmat Grozny drives forward and Ismael Silva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cedric Gogoua.
In the minute 21, Cedric Gogoua for Volgograd is back on the field again.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a penalty in Grozny...
Andres Ponce hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny are awarded a penalty at Akhmat-Arena. Andres Ponce takes the kick ... But misses!
In the minute 31, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Akhmat Grozny's Idris Umaev is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 34, Idris Umaev is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) has taken off Idris Umaev who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Odise Roshi is the replacement.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Volgograd drive forward but Kamil Mullin is judged offside.
In the minute 37, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Volgograd's Kamil Mullin has been booked in Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva gets in a shot on goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Kamil Mullin (Volgograd) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
In the minute 45, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
The first-half is over.
Cedric Gogoua is booked for the away team.
Artem Timofeev (Akhmat Grozny) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team have replaced Evgeny Kharin with Vladimir Iljin. This is the second substitution made today by Andrey Talalaev.
Akhmat Grozny make their third substitution with Oleg Ivanov replacing Andres Ponce.
Vladimir Iljin is on target to give Akhmat Grozny a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Oleg Ivanov.
In the minute 49, Odise Roshi (Akhmat Grozny) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Sergey Makarov returns to the field for Volgograd after picking up a slight injury.
The match at Akhmat-Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sergey Makarov, who is down injured.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Akhmat Grozny.
Odise Roshi (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 53, Goal! Akhmat Grozny extend their lead to 2-0 through Odise Roshi.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 57, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's first substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Sergey Serchenkov replacing Mukhammad Sultonov.
Sergey Serchenkov keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Volgograd pushes forward through Oleg Aleynik, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 59, Akhmat Grozny drive upfield at Akhmat-Arena and Odise Roshi hits the bar with a header.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Volgograd at Akhmat-Arena.
Goal! Odise Roshi extends Akhmat Grozny's lead to 3-1.
Vladimir Iljin instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 62, Anton Piskunov (Volgograd) gets a yellow card.
Akhmat Grozny are in shooting range from this free kick.
Volgograd push upfield but Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 65, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Odise Roshi (Akhmat Grozny) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 66, Vladimir Iljin of Akhmat Grozny smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny drive forward through Odise Roshi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 68, Volgograd needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
Ismael Silva (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 70, Free kick Volgograd.
Cedric Gogoua (Volgograd) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 73, Armen Manucharyan is on a sub for Sergey Makarov for Volgograd.
Akhmat Grozny's Odise Roshi breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 74, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
The away team replace Evgeniy Pesegov with Azat Bairyyev.
Oleg Nikolaev is replacing Ilya Zhigulev for Volgograd at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 77, Akhmat Grozny surge into the attack at Akhmat-Arena but Vladimir Iljinâ€™s header is off-target.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 78, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a fourth substitution, with Khalid Kadyrov replacing Bernard Berisha.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Volgograd.
In the minute 83, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 84, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a fifth substitution, with Anton Shvets replacing Ismael Silva.
Akhmat Grozny are coming forward and Artem Timofeev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Volgograd.
Akhmat Grozny's Vladimir Iljin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Artem Timofeev (Akhmat Grozny) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Akhmat Grozny push upfield and Odise Roshi gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Volgograd defence.
Important block from the Akhmat Grozny defence as Oleg Nikolaev fires in a strike for Volgograd.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Oleg Ivanov (Akhmat Grozny) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
That's full-time at Akhmat-Arena. The final score is 3-1.
